notes.text: Got to KOG with this in 38 wins, new record for me. triple storm was incredibly good and was very consistent for getting rid of backrow, and was helpful more often than it bricked. Had a very easy time versus Ca matchup thanks to WoD and Econ. Storm beat AG, Dinos, and Glad Beasts most every time. Skill successor was also very clutch, definitely didn’t steal the idea for it. Imo didn’t need bacon saver because I drew it so often but it was still very helpful overall
